name: In re ESTATE OF Terry L. KENDALL, Deceased. Appeal of Susan L. Kendall

parties: In re ESTATE OF Terry L. KENDALL, Deceased. Appeal of Susan L. Kendall.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been IMPROVIDENTLY GRANTED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: James F. Mannion, Mannion Prior, L.L.P., King of Prussia, Ann C. Lebowitz, Grant & Lebowitz, L.L.C., Philadelphia, for Susan L. Kendall, Appellant.

Stephen H. Green, Dolchin, Slotkin & Todd, P.C., Philadelphia, for Joanne Kendall, Appellee.

15 A.3d 430
In re ESTATE OF Terry L. KENDALL, Deceased. Appeal of Susan L. Kendall.

Argued March 9, 2011.
Decided March 16, 2011.
